valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 16 Nov 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 17 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low FitzRoy 1000 expected Portugal 1011 by 0600 tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
Northwesterly 5 to 7 veering northerly 7 to severe gale 9, backing northwesterly 6 to gale 8 later.
Sea state
Moderate or rough becoming very rough or high.
Weather
Squally showers, turning to sleet or snow.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally very poor.
